${ModID}:Whirligig.NAME: Whirligig
${ModID}:Whirligig.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:Sliiiiither.NAME: Sliiiiither
${ModID}:Sliiiiither.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! to 3 additional cards.

${ModID}:TailFlail.NAME: Tail Flail
${ModID}:TailFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to !${ModID}:sd! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Muddle the !M! highest cost cards in your hand.

${ModID}:Sneckpot.NAME: Sneckpot
${ModID}:Sneckpot.DESCRIPTION: Draw and ${ModID}:Muddle X cards. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the total cost of your hand.
${ModID}:Sneckpot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw and ${ModID}:Muddle X+1 cards. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the total cost of your hand.

${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.NAME: Whip 'n Snapper
${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! to !M! Weak and !${ModID}:m2! to !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Gulp.NAME: Meal Prep
${ModID}:Gulp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Ablation and trigger it for each [E] this card costs. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.NAME: Snazzy Swagger
${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL anniv5:Muddle all cards in your hand. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:SneckoEyes.NAME: Snecko Eyes
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards.
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards. NL Startup: Become Confused.

${ModID}:Shedding.NAME: Shedding
${ModID}:Shedding.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, anniv5:Muddle the {!M!|>1=!M! highest cost cards|@=highest cost card} in your hand.
